document.full_text: world stocks rose on friday, supported by a weaker dollar as investors took the view after weak u.s. economic data this week that the federal reserve will be slow to raise interest rates.
document.title: world stocks edge up, supported by weak dollar
lines_and_colors: world stocks rose on friday, supported by a weaker dollar as investors took the view after weak u.s. economic data this week that the federal reserve will be slow to raise interest rates.
